conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours optimize their customer engagement through omnichannel marketing. I saw that Infobip is using a variety of channels to interact with customers, and I think our solution could help streamline those efforts.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, yes. Infobip. We're actually pretty happy with our current setup, and I'm not sure we're looking to add any new tools to the mix. What makes you think DeepData AI would be a good fit for us?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Well, our solution has been shown to increase customer engagement by up to 30% and reduce costs by up to 25%. We've worked with similar companies in the industry, such as telecommunications and finance, and seen some really impressive results. I'd love to set up a demo to show you exactly how it works.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I'm not sure that's necessary. We're in the middle of a big project right now, and I don't have the bandwidth to take on something new. Plus, I'm not even sure if we have the budget for it. What's the pricing like for DeepData AI?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our pricing is competitive with other solutions on the market. We offer a tiered pricing structure, with discounts for larger volumes of data. I can give you a custom quote based on your specific needs, but I think we could definitely find a pricing plan that works for you.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate that, but like I said, I'm not the one who makes the budget decisions. And even if I was, I'm not sure we'd be interested in switching from our current solution. We've invested a lot in our current infrastructure, and I'm not sure it would be worth it to integrate a new tool. Do you have any experience with integrating with Infobip's platform?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Yes, we've worked with Infobip before, and our solution integrates seamlessly with their platform. We've also developed APIs and other tools to make integration as smooth as possible. I think we could make it work, but I understand your concerns.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate your understanding, but I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI. We just don't have the budget or the resources to take on a new project like this, and I don't have the authority to approve new tools even if we did. Sorry.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Authority
Feedback: The seller should have attempted to escalate the conversation to the decision-maker or asked for an introduction to the person responsible for budget and tool adoption decisions. Sentiment: Neutral
